title: Chained Together
description:
Begin your journey in the depths of hell, chained to your companions . Your mission is to escape hell by climbing as high as possible. Each jump requires perfect coordination to scale the platforms and escape the scorching heat. Traverse a multitude of worlds, each offering unique challenges. Noreya: The Gold Project
3 Game Modes
Leaderboards Track your escape speeds with leaderboards that compare completion times across different player configurations. Whether solo or in cooperation with up to 4 players in multiplayer mode, each step brings you closer to the summit

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
